1376: Badeloghen was born in Helle voet in 1376.
1378: Lost father at the age of 2.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 3.
Left Helle voet.C.8 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 4.
1387: Lost sibling Hugheman in 1387 when Hugheman was 11.
1389: Lost sibling Enekonus in 1389 when Enekonus was 20.
Got married to Wicghard at age 14 in 1389.
Was taken out of orphanage at age 14.
Left orphanage at the age of 14.
Badeloghen moved to De Tuyt.A.3 after marriage.
Moved in with husband Wicghard after marriage.
1390: Gave birth to Everdey in 1390 at age 14.
1392: Gave birth to Arnoud in 1392 at age 16.
1393: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1393 at age 17.
1395: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1395 at age 19.
1396: Gave birth to Hugheman in 1396 at age 20.
1399: Lost son Hugheman when Hugheman was 4 years old.
Got married a second time to Tarun at age 24 in 1399.
Had Tarun move in at De Tuyt.A.3 after marriage.
